mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diet_record (mem_no, diet_date, meal_type, food_name, calories, memo) VALUES (#{memNo}, #{dietDate}, #{mealType}, #{name}, #{calories}, #{memo})
mapper.select: SELECT record_id AS recordId, mem_no AS memNo, diet_date AS dietDate, meal_type AS mealType, food_name AS name, calories, memo FROM diet_record WHERE mem_no = #{memNo}
